content.description: In a 2015 commencement address at Middlebury College, poet Julia Alvarez advised graduates: “In order to be what we long to be, we have to belong. So, community is vital. You belong in a community where you can be what you long to be, a place that keeps reminding you that you have a soul.” Write an essay that argues your position on the extent to which Alvarez’s claim about community is valid. In your response you should do the following: Respond to the prompt with a thesis that presents a defensible position. Provide evidence to support your line of reasoning. Explain how the evidence supports your line of reasoning. Use appropriate grammar and punctuation in communicating your argument.
